articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Pistol permit applications rise in NY community after attack
articles.description: The number of people applying for handgun permits has spiked in a New York community shaken last month by a machete attack that injured five men during a Hanukkah celebration
articles.content:
MONSEY, N.Y. -- 
The number of residents seeking to own handguns has risen sharply in a New York community shaken last month by a machete attack that injured five men during a Hanukkah celebration.

articles.title: China's foreign minister heads to Zimbabwe on Africa tour
articles.description: China’s foreign minister is to arrive in Zimbabwe as part of a five-nation tour of Africa that seeks to promote the Asian giant's economic and political interests on the continent
articles.content:
HARARE, Zimbabwe -- 
Chinas foreign minister is to arrive in Zimbabwe Saturday as part of a five-nation tour of Africa that seeks to promote the Asian giant's economic and political interests on the continent.

articles.title: Magnitude 6 shock rocks quake-stunned Puerto Rico
articles.description: A magnitude 6.0 quake has shaken Puerto Rico, causing further damage along the island’s southern coast, where previous recent quakes have toppled homes and schools
articles.content:
SAN JUAN, Puerto Rico -- 
A magnitude 6.0 quake shook Puerto Rico on Saturday, causing further damage along the islands southern coast, where previous recent quakes have toppled homes and schools.

articles.title: Three dead in Louisiana as severe storms sweep southern US
articles.description: Authorities in Louisiana say three people have died after severe storms swept across parts of the Gulf Coast and Southeast U.S. One of the victims was a man who was killed when a tree fell on his home
articles.content:
DALLAS -- 
Authorities in Louisiana said Saturday said at least three people have died in connection with a severe storm that is sweeping across parts of the U.S. Gulf Coast and Southeast.
